name: SomethingNice
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: say something nice
des:
Alexa is prepared to shower you with compliments and words of affirmation. When asked, Alexa will give you a compliment that you haven't heard recently, rotating between FREE and any additional compliments from one-time purchases that you make.

HOW TO START
"Alexa, say something nice"

THEN YOU CAN SAY
"thanks"
"say something Clever"
"what other compliments do you know" 
"stop"

FREE (examples)
Classic - "Your smile makes my day"
Clever - "Is it too bold to say that you are perfect?"

ONE-TIME PURCHASE (examples)
Funny - "As Buddy the Elf would say, you're so pretty you should be on a Christmas card."
Sophisticated - "Most people merely plod along. You on the other hand, you glide."

Please leave a review if you like the skill. We really appreciate it and it helps encourage us to keep working on more great skills for you. Any questions or comments can be emailed to support@myalexadevice.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
